attributes.action: High Speed Broadband - Great Ashby Estate (Stevenage)
attributes.additional_details:
Part of the Great Ashby Community only receive Broadband service from BT.  There are no current plans for BT to upgrade the Cabinet over the next 12 Months.  This community is left with Rural speed broadband (1.5mb, while other communities surrounding have access to High Speed broadband from BT and Virgin.

I like the government to apply pressure on BT and Virgin to ensure that communities with little choice and slow speeds are given priority over area's which have high speeds and choice.
